###User Defined Function###
_GUICtrlRebar_GetBKColor

###Description###
Retrieves a rebar control's default background color

###Syntax###
#Include <GuiRebar.au3>
_GUICtrlRebar_GetBKColor($hWnd)

###Parameters###
@@ParamTable@@
$hWnd
	Handle to rebar control
@@End@@

###ReturnValue###
Success: A COLORREF value that represent the current default background color

###Remarks###
None.

###Related###
_GUICtrlRebar_SetBKColor
